topic_detail: Deep dive into Promises, async/await, and error handling

questions.content: What is the initial state of a Promise?
questions.explanation: A Promise starts in the 'pending' state. It transitions to either 'fulfilled' (resolved) or 'rejected'.

questions.content: Explain the difference between Promise.all() and Promise.race().
questions.correct_answer: Promise.all waits for all promises to resolve or one to reject. Promise.race settles as soon as the first promise settles (resolves or rejects).
